import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function CustomerInfoPage(props){ const customerNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(false); props.setShippingNav(true); props.setPaymentNav(false); } const backCNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(true); props.setShippingNav(false); props.setPaymentNav(false); } return (
backCNavHandler()}>Return to Shop
) }
